category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: GMS_offline_use_TcGS
preference.preference_description: Specifies whether or not briefcase export and import actions use TCIF components to perform transfers. Valid Values: TRUE - TCIF participates in the transfer process. TCIF must be installed to use this value. FALSE - Briefcase transfers are performed without the use of TCIF components and features.
